alert.note: Alert for Northern Spartanburg; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 8:33PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Spartanburg County through 900 PM EDT... At 833 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles south of Spartanburg, or near Roebuck, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Boiling Springs SC, Pacolet, Roebuck, Pacolet Mills, Moore, USC Upstate, Croft State Park, Cedar Springs and Cowpens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
